channel.title: Error
channel.description:
Well, I got an error when I added some cows in the Autospawn document. Compiling went just fine, but when I try to start server I get this error saying:
Exception in thread "main" java. lang. NumberFormatException: For input String "spawn = 81 3262 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow.
at java. lang NumberformatException. For inputstring<Unknown source> at java. lang. Integerer ParseInt<Unknown source> at Npchandler. loadautospawn<npchandler. Java:2489> at NPCHandler. <init><NPCHandler.java:<24> at server.main<server.java:24>
Here is the codes in AutoSpawn:
//Start of cows spawn = 81 3262 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow Spawn = 81 3261 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow spawm = 81 3260 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow spawm = 81 3259 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow spawm = 81 3258 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow spawm = 81 3257 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow //--end of Cows
Please help me

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Hunted666 Hunted666
item.description:
@Hunted666 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:261988”]You’re linking to your hard drive. You need to upload the picture somewhere.
My guess though is that you have put spaces where you need a tab though.[/quote]

Hehe, fixed. And I did edit the post, I did write my code and the error.

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You’re linking to your hard drive. You need to upload the picture somewhere.
My guess though is that you have put spaces where you need a tab though.

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Hunted666 Hunted666
item.description:
@Hunted666 wrote:

Well, I got an error when I added some cows in the Autospawn document.
Compiling went just fine, but when I try to start server I get this error saying:

Exception in thread “main” java. lang. NumberFormatException: For input String "spawn = 81 3262 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow.

at java. lang NumberformatException. For inputstring
at java. lang. Integerer ParseInt
at Npchandler. loadautospawn<npchandler. Java:2489>
at NPCHandler. <NPCHandler.java:<24>
at server.mainserver.java:24

Here is the codes in AutoSpawn:

//Start of cows
spawn = 81 3262 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow
Spawn = 81 3261 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow
spawm = 81 3260 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow
spawm = 81 3259 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow
spawm = 81 3258 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow
spawm = 81 3257 3293 0 0 0 0 0 1 Cow
//–end of Cows

Please help me
